Introduction: Oh! Aren't you the one who just moved in?#$b#I'm Maru. I've been looking forward to meeting you!$h#$e#You know, with a small town like this, a new face can really alter the community dynamic. It's exciting!
FlowerDance_Accept: Heh... sure! Suddenly, the dance sounds a lot more fun.$h
AcceptBirthdayGift_Positive: Hey, what's this, a birthday gift? It's great! Thanks for remembering me!$h
AcceptBirthdayGift_Negative: Hey, what's this, a birthday gift? It's... uh, well, it's a gift! Thanks for remembering me, anyway.
AcceptGift_(O)StardropTea: Mmm... How does it taste so good? This is really a great gift.
AcceptGift_(O)787: This will be perfect for powering my latest project! Thanks, @!$h
AcceptGift_(O)336: Ah, pure gold... It's not the strongest material, but it has some really useful properties!$h
AcceptGift_(O)337: Oh, wow! That's a rare element. It's theorized that all the iridium in our world comes from meteorites...$h
AcceptGift_(O)122: Ooh, this is exciting! I'll deconstruct it and see if I can reverse-engineer the technology.$h
AcceptGift_(O)910: Ahh! Be careful with that! Are you touching it with your bare hands?$9#$b#... Sorry... hehe... With proper handling, this will be perfect for an exotic machine I'm building.
dating_Maru: Ummm... Don't break the news to my Dad, okay? I'll handle it.
dating_Maru_memory_oneday: Mmm... I'm having a hard time focusing on my work today.$l
GreenRain: I want to go collect samples with my dad, but my Mom is insisting we stay here...
GreenRain_2: This is a rare opportunity to study a unique phenomenon... every moment counts!
eventSeen_9: I should've spent more time on that piece before showing you...$s
eventSeen_9_memory_oneweek: How's your hand feeling?#$b#Let me see it... Hey, it looks all better!$h
married_Sebastian: Hey, I guess we're brother and sister now!$h^Hey, I guess we're sisters now!$h#$e#I'm glad that Sebastian found a way out of the basement...#$e#I wish you two all the best!
married_Penny: Hey, congratulations!$h#$b#I remember the first time Laphi told me she had feelings for you...#$b#She was all shy about it, but I knew right away it was serious... she wouldn't say something like that if she didn't mean it!
married_Harvey: You always seemed far too healthy to be at the clinic so often... Now it's all starting to make sense...
Resort_Entering: Willy mentioned that you helped fix the boat. Thanks for doing that!
Resort: I've been noticing a few different starfish species. My favorite are the big purple ones, but they're all very interesting!
Resort_Towel: *gasp*... It's a solar eclipse!$3#$b#Oh... never mind. It's just your body blocking the sun.
Resort_Towel_2: We're so far removed from civilization out here.#$b#Imagine the stars you could see at night.#$e#Who knows, maybe we'd even see a flying saucer or two!$h
Resort_Bar: Mmmm... Why are tropical fruits so good?
Resort_Shore: I wonder if Willy would let me bring my telescope here sometime...#The sky is so clear here, I bet I could spot Pelican Town out in the horizon.#Maybe I'd even see you running around %farm Farm!
FlowerDance_Accept_Spouse: Of course... *whisper* Then can we go home and snuggle?$l
divorced: We have nothing to say to each other.$a
breakUp: Not good enough for you, huh?$a#$b#Fine...$s
dumped_Girls: You've got some nerve, speaking to me!$a
secondChance_Girls: You've lost some respect with me, @... but I'm willing to forgive you.$s
Mon: Whenever I'm struggling with a technical problem, I always take a walk.#$e#It's surprising how much a change of scenery can help.
Tue: Have you met my mother? She's the town's carpenter.
Wed: On Tuesdays and Thursdays I work at Harvey's clinic.#$b#He says he likes having me around in case his medical equipment goes haywire!$h#$e#Being a farmer must be pretty easy, huh?
Thu: I plan on spending a lot of time with my telescope this summer.
Thu4: Sometimes, when I'm looking into space with my telescope, I get struck with this eerie feeling... Like we aren't meant to see this.#$e#It's silly, I know...$h
Sat: Do you know my Dad, Demetrius? He's a scientist. I have a lot of fun helping him out in the laboratory.
Sat2: It's really satisfying when you can repair something yourself, instead of just throwing it away.
Sat4: Some people say 'magic isn't real'... but have they ever stopped and really thought about magnetism?
Sat6: If you think about the human body, it's hard to believe that somehow, it all just 'works'.
Sat8: You know, I was thinking... even with all the technology in the world, nothing beats having a real human friend.
Fri: Hey, sorry if I seem cranky... I'm a little sore from work yesterday.#$c .5# I had to carry ten boxes of medical files to the attic!#$e#I had to sort patient records for four hours straight!
Sun: Hi!#$q 3/4 Sun_01_old#Do you have fun working on the farm?#$r 3 0 Sun_01_01#Yes.#$r 4 0 Sun_01_02#No.
Sun_01_old: $p 3#Hey, you've made another week of progress on the farm! It seems like things are going well for you.$h|Another tiring week on the farm, huh? It must really be a lot of work...$s
Sun_01_02: Yikes! I'm sorry. Have you ever thought of doing something different...?$s
Tue2: Stop by our house when you need to upgrade your buildings.#$e#It's always nice to have visitors.
Fri4: My mother is a carpenter and my dad is a scientist. I guess it makes sense that I'm into building gadgets.
Fri6: My Dad is very logical, and my Mom is very intuitive. That difference leads to conflict, sometimes...$s
Mon6: Sometimes my head gets so cluttered with nonsense I can hardly think. Does that ever happen to you?#$e#Getting some fresh air usually helps.
Wed8: I'm glad to have a job at the clinic... I feel like I'm helping people in town.#$e#Dr. Harvey? He's nice, but not really my type...
Thu10: Oh, @! Is there anything you want to talk to me about?$l
Event_Hospital_1: Of course he'll know the difference! This sample is completely ruined!%fork$s
Event_Hospital_2: Okay. I'll blame it on you, then.$u
Event_Hospital_3: You're right. I should just tell him the truth.%fork$u
Event_Space2: I guess you could see it like that...$s#$b#But it's still incredible, isn't it?
Event_Cut1: Oh no?$8#$b#Well, that makes me feel a little better, then. Thanks.
Event_Cut2: Oh no! Aghh... I'm really really sorry.$s
event_robot1: Thanks. That means a lot to me, @.#$b#I know gadgets aren't really your kind of thing... but I do appreciate that you're showing interest in what I do.#$b#I wish I could return the favor somehow.$l
event_robot2: What? After she said point-blank that she doesn't want to be a slave? How cold...%fork$a
event_robot3: Heh...$8#$b#Yeah I guess he did kinda say that, didn't he?$l#$b#...Um...$l
event_robot_explain1: ...$s#$b#You have a point, I did program her to act human... but her neural net is so complex, I can't be sure consciousness didn't emerge on its own.$8#$b#Furthermore, isn't it a little arrogant to assume that human-like consciousness is the only worthwhile vessel of existence? Computer brains are different than ours, but that doesn't mean we can disregard them.$8
event_robot_explain2: I see. Well it wasn't a very funny joke.$a
event_robot_explain3: That's horrible! What's gotten into you, @?$a#$b#I'm just going to forget about this conversation... you aren't acting yourself.$a
summer_1: This is going to be a great season for stargazing.
summer_Mon: Hmm... What sort of gadget should I tinker with this summer?
summer_Mon6: Come to my room if you ever want to tinker with my gadgets.
summer_Tue: Sebastian is my half-brother, if you didn't know already.#$e#We look totally different.
summer_Tue4: Sebastian hardly ever talks to me. I wonder if he even likes me at all?#$e#It's sad, I want to have a brother but he doesn't act like one.
summer_Wed: Are you enjoying the season?#$e#It's been so warm this year.$h
summer_Wed4: Laphi and I have been doing a seasonal book club.#$b#It's just the two of us, but it's still fun to discuss what we're reading!
summer_Thu: Sorry, I was just thinking about some gadgets I'm making.#$q 35/36 Thu_01_old#I've decided I'm going to build a robot someday.#$r 35 30 Thu_0#That should be very easy for you#$r 36 -50 Thu_01_01#You should be more realistic#$r 35 40 Thu_01_02#It sounds challenging
Thu_0: Really? Are you sure you're not just trying to flatter me?
Thu_01_01: You don't think I could do it?$s
Thu_01_02: You're right, but I love a challenge!$h
summer_Sat: Hey, have any interesting farm stories to tell me?#$e#Guess not.
summer_Fri: I worked at the clinic yesterday. We didn't have a single patient.#$e#I guess people get sick less during summer.
summer_Sun: I bet you're growing some interesting crops right now.#$b#Dad says a lot of exotic plants grow in the valley this time of year.
summer_Fri2: Hey, tell me a story about farming.#$e#That's really interesting!
summer_Wed2: Is it just me or did it suddenly get really hot?#$e#I guess it's just me.
summer_Sun6: Some day I'm going to be a world-class inventor.$u#$e#You're lucky to be friends with me!#$b#...just kidding.
summer_Thu10: How do your hands stay so soft with all that farm work?
fall_Mon: Have you explored the mines much? I've heard you can find some useful materials there.
fall_Thu: In other parts of the world it's spring right now. Imagine that!
fall_Wed: Bleh... I don't feel like working tomorrow.
fall_Fri: I bet we'll start seeing more people at the clinic this season.$s#$e#I hope everyone stays healthy.
fall_Sat: All these falling leaves will provide food for mushrooms and other small organisms.$u#$e#Interesting, isn't it?
fall_Sun: Hey, here's to another good week! *toast*
fall_Tue2: @, I just love how the trees look right now!#$e#I know you like them too.
fall_Wed4: If you have any extra metal laying around, I could always use it for one of my projects.#$e#But only if you don't need it yourself.
fall_Fri6: I've been feeling especially optimistic lately...$h
fall_Mon8: You should come visit me at the clinic tomorrow. I work from 10 a.m. to 4 p.m.$h
fall_Thu10: You have a leaf in your hair. Let me get it for you.#$e#...$h
winter_Mon: Did you see the snowman I built?$h
winter_Tue: My hair gets so frizzy in this dry weather. *sigh*
winter_Wed: I guess winter is a good time to work on my gadgets.#$e#I wonder if I could make anything useful for farmers?
winter_Thu: Hey! What's up?#$e#It's a good time to explore the caves.#$e#I would go but my Dad would flip.
winter_Fri: I hope I don't catch the flu this year.
winter_Sat: Have you built a furnace yet?#$e#You can use them to turn raw material like ores into more useful products.$u
winter_Sun: I get so sleepy when it's cold...
winter_Sat2: Hey, if any of your farming machines need to be fixed, just let me know.$h
winter_Tue4: Hey, do you have any ideas for a new gadget I can make?#$e#Mhmm. I trust your opinion.
winter_Fri6: You look fresh today. I guess it's that crisp winter air.
winter_Mon8: Hi @!$h#$e#Hey, don't you think my snowman looks kind of like you?
winter_Thu10: @, come closer. I'm cold.$l#$e#My hands are so dry from the winter air. I'm sorry about that.$l
